name: Super Waste Separator
description:
Separate waste from this huge medieval castle!

Controls:

Drag waste with LMB

Press RMB while dragging axe to break it

Press RMB while dragging full flask to pour it in cauldrone

Credits:

Assest: 

Gdevelop assetstore - fantasy icons
